description.value:
Wondrous Item - Uncommon

This tri-chambered quiver opens into extradimensional storage that never weighs more than 2 pounds.


Properties

  • The shortest compartment holds up to 60 arrows, bolts, or similarly sized ammunition.

  • The midsized compartment holds up to 18 javelins or comparable pole munitions.

  • The longest compartment holds up to 6 long objects such as bows, quarterstaffs, or spears.

  • You can draw items from the quiver as if it were a normal quiver or scabbard.
